item.title: Generic tip
item.description: View all the installed Postfix completions #DriveToDevelop pic.twitter.com/6Io0myh863 — IntelliJ IDEA (@intellijidea) June 19, 2018 This is how a generic code tip could look like. 1 2 3 4 5 package main func main() { println("demo") } For a complete list of supported languages for highlighting, see: https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/
